verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Therefore thou son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against גּ֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> Gog, against Gog וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> ve-'A-mar-ta, and say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha I am against גּ֔וֹג <S%H1463><s%> Gog, Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <S%H5387><s%> ne-Si prince רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> Me-shech of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <S%H8422><s%> ve-tu-Val. and Tubal

וְשֹׁבַבְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-shoav-Ti-cha And I will turn thee back וְשִׁשֵּׁאתִ֔יךָ <S%H8338><s%> ve-shish-she-Ti-cha, and leave but the sixth part וְהַעֲלִיתִ֖יךָ <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'a-li-Ti-cha of thee and will cause thee to come up מִיַּרְכְּתֵ֣י <S%H3411><s%> mi-yar-ke-Tei parts צָפ֑וֹן <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fon; from the north וַהֲבִאוֹתִ֖ךָ <S%H935><s%> va-ha-vi-'o-Ti-cha and will bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei thee upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-kei-Ti And I will smite קַשְׁתְּךָ֖ <S%H7198><s%> kash-te-Cha thy bow מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad hand שְׂמֹאולֶ֑ךָ <S%H8040><s%> se-mo-Le-cha; out of thy left וְחִצֶּ֕יךָ <S%H2671><s%> ve-chitz-Tzei-cha and will cause thine arrows מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad hand יְמִינְךָ֖ <S%H3225><s%> ye-mi-ne-Cha out of thy right אַפִּֽיל׃ <S%H5307><s%> 'ap-Pil. to fall

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָרֵ֨י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel תִּפּ֗וֹל <S%H5307><s%> tip-Pol, Thou shalt fall אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <S%H102><s%> 'a-gap-Pei-cha, thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> ve-'am-Mim and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tach; for לְעֵ֨יט <S%H5861><s%> le-'Eit thee unto the ravenous צִפּ֧וֹר <S%H6833><s%> tzip-Por birds כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- to every כָּנָ֛ף <S%H3671><s%> ka-Naf of every sort וְחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> ve-chai-Yat and [to] the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of the field נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ti-cha that [is] with thee I will give לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah to be devoured

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh field תִּפּ֑וֹל <S%H5307><s%> tip-Pol; Thou shalt fall כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni is I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti, for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <S%H7971><s%> ve-shil-lach-ti- And I will send אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh a fire בְּמָג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> be-ma-Gog, on Magog וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> u-ve-yo-she-Vei and among them that dwell הָאִיִּ֖ים <S%H339><s%> ha-'i-Yim in the isles לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach; carelessly וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold בָאָה֙ <S%H935><s%> va-'Ah Behold it is come וְנִֽהְיָ֔תָה <S%H1961><s%> ve-nih-Ya-tah, and it is done נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; GOD ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu That הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this [is] the day אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti. whereof I have spoken

GOD ס sa-Mek
